Text.Page: The researchers are getting nervous about all the {@LinkCreature:45#3002#argonomorph Lokian reavers} that moved in when the gulas left. I'd appreciate your help with them, and I'd like you to check in on Setahl at {@Rgn:45011$$Swampwatch Camp}. Make sure he's not in any trouble over there.
Thanks for your concern. Lahiah likes to look out for me, and I don't mind, really.
